content: Fix user registration to automatically sign in after successful registration
Debug why credentials sign-in logging isn't working
Investigate why production build is using old code despite clean rebuild
Fix Docker build to use local context instead of pulling from registry
Debug why container is still running old code despite rebuild
Fix name validation error in registration form
Fix registration success handling - user should be redirected or shown success message
Debug form state inconsistency - users registering but form showing errors
Debug why success response is not reaching client component
Fix registration redirect issue - success state not triggering redirect
Fix session creation after successful login - user gets 'Please log in' message
Change redirect after signin from dashboard to main page
Remove all dashboard redirects and replace with home redirects
Test the complete auth flow end-to-end
Fix PKCE code verifier error in Google OAuth flow
